A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: a great movie. i loved the character development how it makes you question what you thought you knew about the force. i don't love the plot of this movie but it makes up for t in character and world development. i loved the sexual tension between rey and kylo and am excited to see where that goes in the next movie. this really makes you understand what really means bringing balance to the force means\, and i loved how it turned away from the jedi being these perfect all powerful beings we have seen in the past. excited to see what comes next.
